title: IPCC AR6 summary sparks global climate action

extras.articletext: Scientists urge rapid emissions cuts; governments discuss mitigation and adaptation pathways.

title: Nations debate mitigation strategies ahead of AR6 report

extras.articletext: Policy makers consider ambitious transition plans and finance for adaptation.

title: After IPCC release, countries commit to faster transition

extras.articletext: Leaders pledge to accelerate clean energy deployment and improve resilience.

title: Cities announce adaptation programs following report

extras.articletext: Local governments launch solution-focused initiatives and community trust building.
